branchCategory.name: C(L)KU32, Pin Clamp Cylinder, Plate Type
branchCategory.description: SMC's pin clamp plate type cylinder with a standard magnet, series C(L)KUQ&nbsp;series&nbsp;was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions. Plate type cylinder utilizes an oval piston and allows for closer pin to pin dimensions. Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type. Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.
